name.en: Independent Study: The Encoding and Retrieval of Episodic Memory
name.ch: 獨立研究: 情節記憶的登錄與提取

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.en: The aim of this course is to provide basic and up-dated knowledge about the cognitive operations and neural mechanisms underlying the encoding and retrieval of episodic memory.
goal.ch: The aim of this course is to provide basic and up-dated knowledge about the cognitive operations and neural mechanisms underlying the encoding and retrieval of episodic memory.

content.en: "Basics of cognitive electrophysiology, theories of memory, and functional neuroimaging studies."
content.ch: "Basics of cognitive electrophysiology, theories of memory, and functional neuroimaging studies."

method.en: Lecture Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction
method.ch: 講授 實習/實驗 個別指導

domain.en: 基礎認知神經科學理論 、 認知實驗方法學 、 記憶與情緒
domain.ch: 基礎認知神經科學理論 、 認知實驗方法學 、 記憶與情緒

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

en.competency: Independently design and execute research projects
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments

en.competency: Proficiency and intergration of research tools in Cognitive Neuroscience
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)

ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗 ， 自我評量/同儕互評

ch.competency: 獨立設計與執行研究計畫
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗
口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面)

ch.competency: 溝通、表達與團隊合作能力

en: Department:Graduate Institute of Cognitive Neuroscience、Graduate Institute of Cognitive Neuroscience、International Ph.D. program in Interdisciplinary neuroscience (University System of Taiwan)、International Ph.D. Program in Interdisciplinary Neuroscience only.
ch: 系所:限認知神經科學研究所碩士班、認知神經科學研究所博士班、跨領域神經科學博士學位學程(台灣聯合大學系統)、跨領域神經科學國際研究生博士學位學程。
